targets.query: SELECT last("host_id") FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."replay_stage-new_leader" WHERE $timeFilter
SELECT last("count") FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."broadcast_service-num_peers" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1s)
SELECT count("count") AS "total" FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."vote-native" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) FILL(0)
SELECT count("count") AS " " FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."validator-vote_sent" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) FILL(0)
SELECT ROUND(MEAN("sum")) FROM ( SELECT sum("count") FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."treasury_phase-process_transactions" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1s) )
SELECT MAX("sum") FROM ( SELECT sum("count") FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."treasury_phase-process_transactions" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1s) )
SELECT sum("count") AS "transactions" FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."treasury_phase-process_transactions" WHERE $timeFilter
SELECT sum("count") FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."vote-native" WHERE $timeFilter
SELECT mean("duration_ms") FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."validator-confirmation" WHERE $timeFilter
SELECT median("duration_ms") FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."validator-confirmation" WHERE $timeFilter
SELECT min("duration_ms") FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."validator-confirmation" WHERE $timeFilter
SELECT max("duration_ms") FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."validator-confirmation" WHERE $timeFilter
SELECT percentile("duration_ms", 99) FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."validator-confirmation" WHERE $timeFilter
SELECT sum("count") / 2 AS "packets" FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."packets-recv_count" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(2s) FILL(0)
SELECT sum("count") / 2 AS "errors" FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."treasury-process_transactions-error_count" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(2s) FILL(0)
SELECT sum("count") / 2 AS "transactions" FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."treasury_phase-process_transactions" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(2s) FILL(0)
SELECT mean("total_peers") as "total peers" FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."vote_stage-peer_count" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) FILL(0)
SELECT mean("valid_peers") as "valid peers" FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."vote_stage-peer_count" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) FILL(0)
SELECT mean("count") AS "peers" FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."broadcast_service-num_peers" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1s) FILL(0)
SELECT mean("duration_ms") FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."validator-confirmation" WHERE  host_id =~ /$hostid/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1s) FILL(0)
SELECT "request_amount" FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."drone-airdrop" WHERE $timeFilter fill(null)
SELECT mean("duration_ms") / 1000 AS "."  FROM  "$testnet"."autogen"."thinclient" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "op"
SELECT last("version")  FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."local-deploy"
SELECT sum(*) FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."local-deploy" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) FILL(0)
SELECT sum(*) FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."local-manager" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) FILL(0)
SELECT sum("one") FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."panic" WHERE $timeFilter
SELECT sum("one") as "." FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."panic" WHERE $timeFilter   GROUP BY time($__interval), "program" fill(null)
SELECT sum("killed") FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."oom-killer" WHERE $timeFilter
SELECT time, host_id,program,thread, message FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."panic"  WHERE $timeFilter ORDER BY time DESC
SELECT sum("killed") as "." FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."oom-killer" WHERE $timeFilter   GROUP BY time($__interval), "victim", "hostname" fill(null)
SELECT host_id,error FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."validator_process_entry_error"  WHERE $timeFilter ORDER BY time DESC
SELECT host_id,error FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."block_buffer_pool_error"  WHERE $timeFilter ORDER BY time DESC
SELECT sum("count") AS "total_errors" FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."treasury-process_transactions-error_count" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1s) FILL(0)
SELECT sum("count")  AS "blockhash_too_old" FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."treasury-process_transactions-error-reserve_blockhash" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1s) FILL(0)
SELECT sum("count") AS "account_loaded_twice" FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."treasury-process_transactions-account_loaded_twice" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1s) FILL(0)
SELECT sum("count") AS "blockhash_not_found" FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."treasury-process_transactions-error-blockhash_not_found" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1s) FILL(0)
SELECT sum("count") AS "duplicate_signature" FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."treasury-process_transactions-error-duplicate_signature" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1s) FILL(0)
SELECT sum("count") AS "insufficient_funds" FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."treasury-process_transactions-error-insufficient_funds" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1s) FILL(0)
SELECT sum("count") AS "account_in_use" FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."treasury-process_transactions-account_in_use" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1s) FILL(0)
SELECT sum("count") AS "account_not_found" FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."treasury-process_transactions-account_not_found" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1s) FILL(0)
SELECT balance FROM  "$testnet"."autogen"."bench-tps-lamport_balance" WHERE $timeFilter fill(null)
SELECT "duration" / 1000 as "Generation Time" FROM  "$testnet"."autogen"."bench-tps-generate_txs" WHERE $timeFilter fill(null)
SELECT "duration" / 1000 as "Transmit Time" FROM  "$testnet"."autogen"."bench-tps-do_tx_transfers" WHERE $timeFilter fill(null)
SELECT "duration" / 1000 as "Barrier Transaction Confirmation Time" FROM  "$testnet"."autogen"."bench-tps-send_barrier_transaction" WHERE $timeFilter fill(null)
SELECT sum("count") / 3 FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."exchange_processor-trades" WHERE  host_id =~ /$hostid/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(3s)
SELECT sum("count") / 3 FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."exchange_processor-swaps" WHERE  host_id =~ /$hostid/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(3s)
SELECT sum("count") / 3 AS "trades" FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."bench-exchange-trades" WHERE host_id =~ /$hostid/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(3s)
SELECT sum("count") / 3 AS "swaps" FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."bench-exchange-swaps" WHERE host_id =~ /$hostid/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(3s)
SELECT sum("count") / 3 AS "transfers" FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."bench-exchange-do_tx_transfers" WHERE host_id =~ /$hostid/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(3s)
SELECT sum("count") AS "window receive" FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."streamer-recv_window-recv" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) FILL(0)
SELECT sum("count") AS "window receive" FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."streamer-recv_window-consume" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) FILL(0)
SELECT sum("count") AS "retransmit" FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."streamer-recv_window-retransmit" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) FILL(0)
SELECT sum("count") AS "window receive" FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."streamer-recv_window-recv" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) FILL(0)
SELECT sum("count") AS "broadcast sent" FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."streamer-broadcast-sent" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) FILL(0)
SELECT last("repair-ix") AS "repair-ix" FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."node_group_info-repair" WHERE host_id =~ /$hostid/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT last("repair-slot") AS "repair-slot" FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."node_group_info-repair" WHERE host_id =~ /$hostid/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT last("repair-orphan") AS "slot" FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."node_group_info-repair_orphan" WHERE host_id =~ /$hostid/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT sum("count") AS "sigverify-recv" FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."sigverify_stage-packets_received" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) FILL(0)
SELECT sum("count") AS "banking" FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."treasury_phase-entries_received" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) FILL(0)
SELECT sum("count") AS "record" FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."record_stage-signals_received" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) FILL(0)
SELECT sum("count") AS "lwrite" FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."ledger_writer_stage-entries_received" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) FILL(0)
SELECT sum("count") AS "fetchstage" FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."packets-recv_count" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) FILL(0)
SELECT sum("count") AS "broadcast" FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."broadcast_service-entries_received" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) FILL(0)
SELECT sum("count") AS "banking" FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."treasury_phase-process_packets" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) FILL(0)
SELECT sum("count") AS "sigverify-send" FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."sigverify_stage-verified_packets_send" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) FILL(0)
SELECT sum("count") AS "retransmit" FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."retransmit-stage" WHERE host_id =~ /$hostid/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) FILL(0)
SELECT sum("count") AS "replicate" FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."replicate-stage" WHERE host_id =~ /$hostid/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) FILL(0)
SELECT sum("count") AS "retransmit_q" FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."retransmit-queue" WHERE  host_id =~ /$hostid/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) FILL(0)
SELECT sum("count") AS "recv_window" FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."recv-window" WHERE host_id =~ /$hostid/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) FILL(0)
SELECT sum("count") AS "sigverify" FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."sigverify_stage-time_ms" WHERE  host_id =~ /$hostid/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) FILL(0)
SELECT sum("count") AS "banking" FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."treasury_phase-time_ms" WHERE  host_id =~ /$hostid/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) FILL(0)
SELECT sum("count") AS "request" FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."request_stage-time_ms" WHERE  host_id =~ /$hostid/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) FILL(0)
SELECT sum("count") AS "write" FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."ledger_writer_stage-time_ms" WHERE  host_id =~ /$hostid/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) FILL(0)
SELECT sum("count") AS "broadcast" FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."broadcast_service-time_ms" WHERE  host_id =~ /$hostid/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) FILL(0)
SELECT sum("count") AS "banking_stall" FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."treasury_phase-stall_time_ms" WHERE  host_id =~ /$hostid/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) FILL(0)
SELECT sum("count") AS "banking_buffered" FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."treasury_phase-buffered_packet_time_ms" WHERE  host_id =~ /$hostid/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) FILL(0)
SELECT mean("count") FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."treasury-forks_set_root_ms" WHERE  host_id =~ /$hostid/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT mean("squash_accounts_ms")  AS "squash_account" FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."locktower-observed" WHERE  host_id =~ /$hostid/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT mean("squash_cache_ms")  AS "squash_cache" FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."locktower-observed" WHERE  host_id =~ /$hostid/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT last("consumed") AS "validator" FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."window-stage" WHERE host_id =~ /$hostid/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) FILL(0)
SELECT last("transmit-index") AS "leader" FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."broadcast-service" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) FILL(0)
SELECT last("repair-highest-slot") AS "slot" FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."node_group_info-repair_highest" WHERE host_id =~ /$hostid/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT last("repair-highest-ix") AS "ix" FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."node_group_info-repair_highest" WHERE host_id =~ /$hostid/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT sum("count") FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."treasury_phase-buffered_packets" WHERE  host_id =~ /$hostid/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT sum("count") FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."treasury_phase-forwarded_packets" WHERE  host_id =~ /$hostid/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT sum("count") FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."treasury_phase-consumed_buffered_packets" WHERE  host_id =~ /$hostid/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT sum("count") FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."treasury_phase-rebuffered_packets" WHERE  host_id =~ /$hostid/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT sum("count") FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."fetch_stage-honor_forwards" WHERE  host_id =~ /$hostid/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT sum("count") FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."fetch_stage-discard_forwards" WHERE  host_id =~ /$hostid/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT last("latest") - last("root") FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."locktower-vote" WHERE  host_id =~ /$hostid/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT last("slot") - last("root") FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."locktower-observed" WHERE  host_id =~ /$hostid/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)

panels.title: Locktower Distance in Latest and Root Slot ($hostid)

targets.query: SELECT last("root") FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."locktower-vote" WHERE  host_id =~ /$hostid/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT last("root") FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."locktower-observed" WHERE  host_id =~ /$hostid/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT last("count") FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."replay_stage-new_leader" WHERE   host_id =~ /$hostid/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT mean("packets_received") as "packets_received" FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."net-stats" WHERE  hostname =~ /$hostid/ AND $timeFilter   GROUP BY time(5s) fill(null)
SELECT mean("receive_errors") as "receive_errors" FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."net-stats" WHERE  hostname =~ /$hostid/ AND $timeFilter   GROUP BY time(5s) fill(null)
SELECT mean("rcvbuf_errors") as "rcvbuf_errors" FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."net-stats" WHERE  hostname =~ /$hostid/ AND $timeFilter   GROUP BY time(5s) fill(null)
SELECT mean("packets_sent") as "packets_sent" FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."net-stats" WHERE  hostname =~ /$hostid/ AND $timeFilter   GROUP BY time(5s) fill(null)
SELECT mean("in_octets") as "recv" FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."net-stats" WHERE $timeFilter   GROUP BY time(1s) fill(null)
SELECT mean("out_octets") as "sent" FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."net-stats" WHERE $timeFilter   GROUP BY time(1s) fill(null)
SELECT max("total_time_ms") AS "max" FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."sigverify_stage-total_verify_time" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) FILL(0)
